item.title: 2 people die in small plane crash near suburban Denver airport
item.description: Officials say two people died when a small plane crashed and caught on fire near an airport in suburban Denver on Friday

item.title: Scientists tap 'secret' fresh water under ocean, raising hopes for a thirsty world
item.description: Scientists conducting a first-of-its-kind drilling operation have extracted samples of fresh water hiding in massive reservoirs deep under the ocean

item.title: Wall Street climbs to more records on hopes for cuts to interest rates
item.description: U.S. stocks are rising to more records on expectations that the Federal Reserve will have to cut interest rates soon to help the economy
